greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Bordered Pascal's triangle in rectangular format.
comment: This is the weight array (defined at A144112) of Pascal's rectangle - that is, Pascal's triangle A007318 formatted as a rectangle.
formula: After deleting row 1, (1 0 0 0 ...) and column 1, (1 0 0 0 ...), the remaining array is given by R(m,n)=C(m+n-2,m-1). This "Pascal rectangle" is the accumulation array of A144225.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Sep 15 2008
